hero.subtitle: Free Your Colorful World
hero.description: One-click generate coloring pages—print and play! Parent-child storytelling through color, screen-free bonding experience.

textToImage.title: Generate high-quality coloring pages from text
textToImage.description: Enter words like 'Dinosaur', 'Mickey', or 'SpongeBob', and the AI will instantly turn them into art.

imageToColoring.title: Convert images to coloring pages
imageToColoring.description: Upload any photo or image, and our AI will transform it into a beautiful coloring page outline.

gallery.title: Browse our 1,281 free coloring pages; printable in PDF and PNG formats!
gallery.titleSuffix: free coloring pages; printable in PDF and PNG formats!

step1.title: Type your prompts
step1.description: Simply input simple prompts such as 'Pikachu', 'Dinosaur', and so on.

step2.title: Click 'generate' button
step2.description: Click our generate button and wait a few seconds.

step3.title: Wait for generation
step3.description: Our AI will transform your text into amazing coloring pages in just a few seconds.

cta.title: Get Your Coloring Pages
cta.description: One-click generate coloring pages—print and play! Parent-child storytelling through color, screen-free bonding experience.

question1.q: How long does it take to clear image?
question1.a: Our AI-powered tool is fast and efficient, processing your uploaded images in a matter of seconds. You don't have to worry about long wait times, so you can confidently rely on it to help you clear photos in bulk without any delays.

question2.q: Is this AI tool free to use?
question2.a: Yes, we offer a free tier with basic features. However, for advanced features and higher usage limits, we have premium plans available.

question3.q: Will using our tool compromise the quality of the original text?
question3.a: No, our AI is designed to maintain the quality and meaning of the original text while making it more natural.

question4.q: Can this AI tool create high-quality coloring pages?
question4.a: Our AI coloring page generator creates unique, high-quality images that are designed to be original and creative.

question5.q: Will the rewritten text lose its SEO value?
question5.a: No, our AI is designed to maintain the SEO value while making the content more engaging and natural.

question6.q: How many languages does our AI tool support?
question6.a: Currently, we support Chinese and English, but we're working on adding more languages in the future.
